text: Brewster's Millions is a 1921 American comedy movie directed by Joseph Henabery and is the second adaption of the 1902 novel of the same name by George Barr McCutcheon and the 1906 play of the same name. It stars Roscoe 'Fatty' Arbuckle, Betty Ross Clarke, Fred Huntley, Marian Skinner, James Corrigan, Jean Acker, Neely Edwards and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * Category:1921 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies based on plays Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Joseph Henabery
title: Brewster's Millions (1921 movie)
